string.s: Device tree (right click to add device)
The number of devices added has reached the maximum number
Exceeds the maximum number of devices
The port is not set correctly. Please re-confirm!
The user name can not exceed 32 bits and the password can not exceed 16 bits!
Due to network reasons or DVR busy, registration failed!
The recording time can not exceed 24:00
The recording start time can not be greater than the recording stop time
The recording time can not be repeated
Did not find the corresponding device list file, please confirm the path!
Add a default point failed, please re-select the default point to set!
Delete the default point failed, please select the delete item to delete!
Username or password is wrong, please re-enter!
Due to network reasons or DVR busy, registration failed!
Please select the file to play

prototype:#FCNetVideo_HC.SetWndNum(int nWndNum)
Function Description:Set the number of video window
Return value	:int 0- failed 1- success
Parameter 	:nWndNum-Number of windows (only for1，4，9，16，25，36，49，64，81,100,121,144,169)
Sample 	:Set the number of window
Sample

Function prototype:#FCNetVideo_HC.PlayAllVideo(int nPlay)
Function Description:Play/Stop
Return value	:void
Parameter 	:nPlay-Whether to play, 0- stop 1- play
Explain 	:Play / stop the current video
Sample 	:#FCNetVideo_HC.PlayAllVideo(1);//Play the current video

Function prototype:#FCNetVideo_HC.SnathBMP(int nWndIndex)
Function Description:Screenshot
Return value	:void
Parameter 	:nWndIndex-Window index, 0 is the starting index
Explain 	:The index number for the nIndex window to capture
Sample 	:#FCNetVideo_HC.SetWndNum(5);//The index number of 5 window drawings;

Function prototype:#FCNetVideo_HC.ShowVideo(int nWndIndex,int nDeviceIndex, int nChanIndex, 
	 int nFullScreen)
Function Description:Play video
Return value	:int -1-operation failed 0-video off 1-Play video 
Parameter 	:nWndIndex-Play video of the window in the quotation marks, the cable quotes from 0
	 nDeviceIndex-The equipment index index, from the beginning of 0
	 nChanIndex-Channel index, index number starting from 0
	 nFullScreen-Whether full screen 0- normal display 1- full screen display
Explain 	:Play the video of the channel specified in the specified device in the specified window
Sample 	:#FCNetVideo_HC.ShowVideo(1,0,1,1);//Full screen playback of the first device in the second channels of the video

Function prototype:#FCNetVideo_HC.ShowVideoEx(int nWndIndex,CString csDeviceName, 
	 CString csChanName,int nFullScreen)
Function Description: Play Video
Return value	:int -1- operation failed 0- video off 1- video playback 
Parameter 	:nWndIndex-Play video of the window in the quotation marks, the cable quotes from 0
	 csDeviceName-Device name
	 csChanName-Channel name
	 nFullScreen-Whether to maximize, 0- normal display 1- maximum
Explain 	:Play the video of the channel specified in the specified device in the specified window
Sample 	:#FCNetVideo_HC.ShowVideoEx(1,"dev00","camera1",0);//Normal multicast in second video windows
	 Play video in Camera1 channel in dev00 device

Function prototype:#FCNetVideo_HC.LogInOut(int nDeviceIndex,int nLogInOut)
Function Description:Registration / cancellation device
Return value	:int 0-failed 1-success
Parameter 	:nDeviceIndex-The equipment index index, starting from 0
	 nLogInOut 0- cancellation of 1- registration
Explain 	:Registration / cancellation device
Sample 	:#FCNetVideo_HC.LogInOut(1,0);//Second devices in the list of cancelled devices

Function prototype:#FCNetVideo_HC.LogInOutEx(CString csDeviceName,int nLogInOut)
Function Description:Registration / cancellation device
Return value	:int 0-failed 1-success
Parameter 	:csDeviceName-device name
	 nLogInOut 0- cancellation of 1- registration
Explain 	:Registration / cancellation device
Sample 	:#FCNetVideo_HC.LogInOutEx(dev00,0);//cancellation the device list in the name of dev00

Function prototype:#FCNetVideo_HC.AddDevice(CString csDeviceName,CString csIP, int nPort,
	 CString csUserName, CString csPassWord)
Function Description: add and register the device
Return value	:int 0-failed 1-success
Parameter 	:csDeviceName-device name
	 csIP-IP address

	 nPort-Port number
	 csUserName-User name
	 csPassWord-Password
Description 	: add and register the device
Sample 	:#FCNetVideo_HC.AddDevice("dev00","192.168.0.1",8000,"admin","12345");//Add and register the name of dev00, IP for the 192.168.0.1, port number 8000, user name for the admin, password for 12345 of the device

Function prototype:#FCNetVideo_HC.AdjustPreset(int nWndIndex, int nDeviceIndex,int nChanIndex
	 int nPresetIndex)
Function Description: call the preset point
Return value	:int 0-failed 1-success
Parameter 	:nWndIndex-Window index
	 nDeviceIndex-Equipment index
	 nChanIndex-Channel index
	 nPresetIndex-Preset point index
Description 	:Add and register device
Sample 	:#FCNetVideo_HC.AdjustPreset(0,0,1,5);//Call the first device in the first window of the second channels of the video of the fifth preset points

Function prototype:#FCNetVideo_HC.SetPreset(int nWndIndex, int nDeviceIndex,int nChanIndex
	 int nPresetIndex)
Function Description: set the preset point
Return value	:int 0-failed 1-success
Parameter 	:nWndIndex-Window index
	 nDeviceIndex-Equipment index
	 nChanIndex-Channel index
	 nPresetIndex-Preset point index
Explain 	:Set preset point
Sample 	:#FCNetVideo_HC.SetPreset(0,0,1,5);//The current position of the second channel video of the first device in the first window is fifth preset points.

Function prototype:#FCNetVideo_HC.PTZControl(int nWndIndex, int nDeviceIndex,int nChanIndex
	 int nControlIndex,int nStartStop)
Function Description: PTZ control operation
Return value	:int 0-failed 1-success
Parameter 	:nWndIndex-Window index
	 nDeviceIndex-Equipment index
	 nChanIndex-Channel index
	 nPresetIndex- action mark 0-above the PTZ 1-below the PTZ 2-left of PTZ 3-right of PTZ 4-Adjust focal length contraction 5-Adjust focal length extension 6- focus near 7- spotlight far 8- aperture large 9- aperture small
	 nStartStop-Start / stop 0-PTZ start action 1-PTZ stop action
Explain 	:PTZ control operation
Sample 	:#FCNetVideo_HC.PTZControl(0,0,1,0,0);//The first device in the first device in the second channels of the video began to move up

Function prototype:FCNewVideo_HC.ImportFile(int nWithDlg, CString csFilePath)
Function Description:Import network device configuration file
Return value	:void
Parameter 	:WithDlg-Whether need dialog 0-don't need 1-need
 csFilePath-File path name
Explain 	:Import network device configuration file, when nWithDlg is 1, csFilePath is invalid
Sample 	:FCNewVideo_HC.ImportFile(0,"Device.xml");//Import configuration file

Function prototype:FCNewVideo_HC.ExportFile(int nWithDlg, CString csFilePath)
Function Description:Export network device configuration file
Return value	:void
Parameter 	:nWithDlg-Whether need dialog 0-don't need 1-need
	 csFilePath-File path name
Explain 	:Export network device configuration file, when nWithDlg is 1, csFilePath is invalid
Sample 	:FCNewVideo_HC.ExportFile(0,"C:evice.xml");//Export configuration file

Function prototype:FCNewVideo_HC.ShowVideoOnly(int nShowVideo)
Function Description:Display only video
Return value	:void
Explain 	:nShowVideo-Whether to display only the video 0-Not only display video 1-Display only video
Sample 	:FCNewVideo_HC.ShowVideoOnly(1); //Display only video

Function prototype:FCNewVideo_HC.OpenFortufy(int nOperation, int nDeviceIndex)
Function Description:Set the deployment of state
Return value	:int 0-failed 1-success
Parameter 	:none
Explain 	:Set defense
Sample 	:FCNewVideo_HC.OpenFortufy(0,0) //The equipment 0 is set to the deployment of state

Function prototype:FCNewVideo_HC.SetRectEx(int left, int top,int right,int bottom)
Function Description:Set component size
Return value	: none 
Explain 	:Set component size
Sample 	:FCNewVideo_HC.SetRectX(0,0,800,1000) //Set up left and right coordinates are (0,0) and (800,1000);
Due to network reasons or DVR busy, registration failed!
Please turn off the video before proceeding!
The device has a channel that is previewing or recording
